description: The Giant Pincushion Flower (Cephalaria Gigantea) is an eye-catching plant that adds incredible colour and texture to any garden. With its cream-coloured button-like flowers growing up to 2 feet tall, the giant pincushion flower stands out from the rest. Not only is it highly decorative, but it's also easy to care for and naturalises with no problem. If you're looking for a showy, yet low-maintenance plant, the Giant Pincushion flower should be your top choice. It's also a great cut flower, lending a touch of exotic elegance to any floral arrangement. Simply put, the Giant Pincushion flower is a stunning addition to any landscape.
